inn1.comm: low bounce straightaway, the ball bounces once more before reaching the keeper, the batsman nearly edged it
nicely punched off the back foot towards cover, gets behind the line
keeps it around the off stump and he nicely defends on the back foot
he's middling the ball in defense, he pushes it towards the off side
lovely shot! Lot of intent in that one, strays on the pads and he flicks it with authority wide of midwicket and square leg, the ball raced away
drifts towards the pads again and he flicks it straight to midwicket, good start by Sadiq
fullish in length outside off, very low bounce again and he nicely pushes it past cover
Riaz moves it back inwards late and Sadiq nicely punches it off the front foot, Riaz gets a and to it
solid in defense again, very confident beginning by Sadiq getting right behind the line
full and wide and he slashes it hard and high over point, third man is very fine and he slides and stops near the boundary
stays at the crease and slices it away straight to point
goes right back at the crease and pushes it solidly down to mid-off
fullish delivery and nicely pushed off the front foot down to mid-on, off the middle of the bat
goes back at the crease and steers it to the off side
tries to punch that through the off side but he mistimes it, stayed right back at the crease
excellent running, he tucks it with soft hands in front of midwicket and charges off, good communication
another crisp boundary, half volley on middle stump, Noor uses his wrists and flicks it elegantly past square, the fielder chases in despair
gets right behind the line and defends in front of the stumps
drives off the front foot to cover and then sets off but his partner wisely sends him back
Sadiq decides to use his feet and give that a thrash, length delivery, he takes a few paces down and whacks it well wide of mid-off
fullish delivery angling away and he drives down to cover
the ball comes on to him slowly and he opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
crisply timed back foot punch! Gets across his stumps and places it past the diving midwicket fielder
goes right back at his stumps and defends to the on side
times the punch past point really well, Ajmal has to really scamper across from third man and cut it off
slides down the leg side and Gul's lucky to get away with that, the keeper was alert and moved to his left quickly
Sadiq goes for the wild slash over the off side but the ball flies off the edge and drops towards third man

the slowness of the pitch got him, he went right across his stumps to defend but the ball came on a bit slower than he would have expected, he ends up spooning it back to Gul, the ball really stopped on Noor there
gets on the front foot and drives it down to extra cover
stays at the crease and opens the face and steers it to point
Sadiq stays on the back foot and punches it towards cover
pitches it up and Sadiq gives it everything but he fails to cover the angle and nearly edges it to Umar Akmal
gets beside the line and steers it down towards point
excellent running again, he punches it in front of mid-off and realised the fielder was a bit deep, charged out of his crease
once again the ball really stops on the batsman, stays at the crease and chops it down the pitch
squared up at the crease as he tries to work it away, the ball drops on the pitch
once again good use of the wrists, angles towards the pads and he flicks it behind square on the on side
heads up! Sadiq stays at the crease and bludgeons a slower delivery over long-on, dispatched that with intent
dropped, Sadiq flicks it straight to Younis at midwicket, Younis has to fall forward as it travelled quite low, failed to hang on
short one and pulled, miscued shot over midwicket, he was aiming for another big hit to the on side
pitched up outside the off stump and sadiq swings at thin air
opens the face of the bat and steers it towards point
keeps a bit low and he manages to keep it out and work it to the on side
keeps it on the off stump and he gets an inside edge to the on side
Shahzad's off the mark in effortless manner, works his wrists and flicks it with ease past midwicket, the quick outfield does the rest
thick outside edge and no slip! Shahzad flays at one pitched up and moving away, the outside edge flies to third man and Umar Akmal can only watch it go
forget the previous edge, check out this one! Fuller delivery and he shovels it over mid-on, all power behind that shot
shuffles and works it away on one leg down to long leg
turns in and clips his pads as he gets forward and it looked like missing leg, big appeal by Ajmal
gets forward and pushes it to the off side

Reverse sweep for six I'm not kidding, Shahzad changed is guard in a flash and really bludgeoned that over conventional deep extra cover for the right-hander, Shahzad can afford tat smile, he can't believe what he's pulled off
tossed up on middle and he works it down to fine leg
comes down the track and forces it to mid-off
keeps low and he thuds it down to cover point

terrific catch! Shahzad tries to capitalise on the width outside off and carve it over the off side, he was well forward and the ball travelled quickly but Shafiq timed his leap at point and plucked it, excellent reflexes
the ball was angling on the pads and sliding down the leg side and there was a big appeal for a leg before
full and wide and thrashed,  lot of width to work with and he smacked it between  cover and cover point
full outside off and solidly defended on the front foot
gets forward and defends it down the track
Hafeez strays down the leg side and he tries to run it down but misses
gets forward and steers it wide of point
works it down to square leg and takes a single
tossed up on middle and he defends down the track
Mangal's happy to defend on the front foot
gets behind the line on the front foot and defends
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
gets forward and pushes it towards cover
gets across and he clips it to the on side
gets across and pushes it towards point
gets forward and defends down the track
tempts him with more width this time and Mangal tries to square drive this past point
stays back and defends down the track
stays back, waits for the turn and punches it down the track
stays back and taps it back to Hafeez
gets on the front foot and places it to long-on
gets on his knee and sweeps it hard down to fine leg
chips down the track and tries to loft through the line down the ground but gets an outside edge that beats the diving short third man
stays back and defends down the track
clears the front foot and shovels it along the ground to long-on

poor shot from the captain, Afridi floated it on the stumps and Mangal made himself room to loft down the ground, the ball kept low and thudded onto the middle stump, Mangal had exposed the woodwork and after he was bowled he shadow-practiced the shot he intended to play
131.2 kph, it was that quick! He really fired it in and Nabi ensured he was quick to defend
gets forward and he tucks it to the on side
slides it down towards the pads and he gets across and tucks it down to fine leg
gets well across and blocks it out
stays back at the crease and punches it down the ground to long-on
tucks it towards backward square leg
gets well across and defends with soft hands
gets a thick outside edge and there's no slip, Ajmal has to chase it from short third man
another massive hit! Sadiq chipped down the track on seeing the flight and he absolutely whammed that over wide long-on
gets forward and defends
stays back and clips it down to midwicket
the ball clipped the stumps but the bails didn't fall! Talk about luck, the ball floated in and chipped the leg stump and deflected for four
gets forward and defends

sharp catch by Umar Akmal! Afridi fired that a bit quicker outside off, Sadiq tries to drove but gets a thin outside edge and the ball sits nicely behind Akmal's gloves, he didn't have much time to react
fires it full and he ensures he gets behind it to defend
tossed up on middle and leg and he clips it down to fine leg
gets forward and blocks it out
outside off and he pushes it to cover
chance, The doosra and he gets a thick outside which drops to the left of first slip
defends it to the on side
he gets across and gets an inside edge that rolls to the leg side
reads the googly, he blocks it out to midwicket
tucks it towards midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg and he pushes it through the line to long-on
gets forward and he;s beaten as he tries to defend
gets on the front foot and pushes it to cover
comes on very slowly and he punches it down to mid-off
floated on middle and leg and clipped to mid-on
quicker delivery and he's happy to get behind the line to defend
waits for the turn and defends off the meat of the bat
tossed up on middle and he defends to the on side
flatter delivery and he pushes it down to point
tossed up outside off and he defends
strays down the leg side and he tries to run it down, wide called
pushes it through quicker and he works it down towards midwicket
tossed up slower outside off and he's not tempted into the shot
tossed up even slower and he forces it to the on side
gets across and paddles it down to short fine leg
gets well forward and steers it it in front of point and sets off
defends this one to short leg
fires it on the pads and there's an appeal but it was probably missing leg
he beats him on the doosra
clips it with the turn and takes a single to the leg side
fires it on the pads and he defends inside out to the off side
bowls it flat and quick and Naib stays back at the crease and elegantly whips it behind square on the on side, that brings up the 100!
Afridi gets his fourth! Tossed up on off and it's a googly, Naib is forward and the ball strikes him  in front of middle, Taufel raises the finger
quicker delivery and he defends to the off side
comes on a bit slower and he defends with soft hands to the off side
defends with a dead bat in front of the stumps
stays back and blocks out the spin
he really fired that one, clips it but can't beat short leg
gets well forward and clips him just wide of short leg
gets forward and gets an outside edge to the off side
defends this one down to short leg
lovely shot! Nabi gives him the charge and tonks it over wide long-on, he also gave himself room to free his arms
tucks it down to midwicket
tosses it up and he defends with soft hands
gets forward and drives to the off side
fired on the pads and he clips it down to square leg
tossed up outside off and he drives to cover
punches it off the back foot to the off side and quick single taken
fires in a yorker and he manages to squeeze it out to the off side
gets forward and jabs it wide of cover
Nabi was expecting that to fizz past his chest as he bent down to evade it but the ball deflected off his left arm, that would have stung, the physio was out to check on him but he's fine now
tries another yorker but it's a low full toss jammed out to mid-off
slower delivery on the blockhole outside off and squeezed out to mid-on
tossed up outside off and he chops it to point
tossed up even more and he gets an outside edge to short third man
tossed up on the off stump and he pushes it down to mid-off
steers it wide of point for a single
tossed up wide outside off and he frees his arms and takes a couple to wide long-off
full and wide again and once again he forces it down to long-off
full outside the off stump and he pushes it down to cover
drops it towards backward point and sets off the crease and is sent back
squirts it in front of mid-off and does well to put pressure on the fielder
Shenwari opens the face of the bat and steers it neatly to deep backward point, settles for a single
comes on a bit slow onto the bat and he clips it down to square leg
drops it in front of mid-off and thinks of a single but is sent back
turn and bounce and it beats him completely, took Shenwari by surprise
nearly emulates Shahzad's shot! Tossed up outside and Shenwari swiftly changes his guard and reverse sweeps him and the ball just drops short of the rope at deep point
pushes it just wide of cover
turns back in and he clips it down to the leg side
gets forward and pushes it down to long-on, good fielding by Riaz
gets across and paddles it down to fine leg, well played
quicker and flatter and he clips it to the on side
gets across and taps it down the track
slides it down the leg side and the umpire takes his time to call  that a wide
he punches it down to long-on
gets beside the line and steers it down to point
gets it to turn in late and he clips it softly to the on side
clips it with soft hands to the on side
turns it back in and he taps it down the track
steers it to the off side and decides against the single
waits for the turn and clips it down to fine leg
flatter delivery and he slaps it down to sweeper cover and pushes hard for the second, good running
stays back and defends with soft hands
tossed up outside off and he squeezes out a full delivery down to deep point
gets forward and defends
forces a full delivery back to the bowler
gets his pad across and clips it with the turn to the on side
class! Nabi was down the track on seeing the flight and he slammed that high and wide over long-on
follows it up with a single down to fine leg
gets well forward and he pushes it down to cover
gets across and drives to the off side
goes back and defends with soft hands
stays back and blocks it out down the track
he's happy staying back at the crease to defend
opens the face of the bat and steers him wide of point
goes back at the crease and punches it down the track
punched to long-on, the batsmen have looked very comfortable against the spinners barring Afridi
hits a good length and he stays back and defends to the on side
stays beside the line and steers it past point
keeps a bit low and he defends to the off side in front of the stumps
beats him with a beauty which shapes away from the right-hander after pitching, sneaks past the off stump and Akmal failed to gather it properly as well
gets beside the line and pushes it past the cover
taps it down to point
stays back at the crease and defends with soft hands
turns back in and he defends with soft hands
keeps a  bit low and he beats him, Akmal fails to hang on

a run-out halts what was shaping up to be a healthy stand, he clips it down towards midwicket and Nabi charges off is crease and has to turn back, he tries to make his ground at the bowler's end, he dives and the throw by Younis Khan is accurate to Hafeez and the third umpire confirms it
punches it back to Hafeez
opens the face and glides it to point
gives him a bit of room and he stays at the crease and swishes at thin air
stays back and jabs it down to extra cover
angling across the right-hander and he chases it, misses it completely
a touch too wide outside the off stump and he's not tempted into chasing that
forces him on the back foot and he defends
holds the length back outside the off stump and he flashes at it again and misses
sharp turn and it clips his pad and rolls away, would have missed the stumps
turns and really zips through, hits the thigh and rolls away, too quick for the batsman
the doosra takes the outside edge and just beats the slip
another reverse sweep, but this time the ball hits his arm just outside the line of the leg stump and rolls to fine leg, Akmal appeals and the batsmen scamper through for three leg byes
gets forward and defends solidly
gets forward and pushes it to long-off
nips back in and he stays behind the line to defend
loose ball wide outside the off stump and a loose shot as well, tries to cut but misses
pitches it up, he goes forward and places it towards cover
strays on the pads and clips him down to fine leg
hurries him on the back foot with extra bounce, steers it to the off side
shapes away from the right-hander and he tries to steer it away but misses
he plays the late cut well, reads the doosra early, he drops it short and Ashraf opens the face and dabs it late wide of short third man
Ajmal goes round the wicket, tosses it full and wide and Ashraj makes room and drives it square on the off side, well placed
comes forward and defends
gets well forward and blocks out the spin
low full toss and he hammers it down to mid-off, should have put that away
full outside them off stump and he places it straight to cover
gets beside the line and steers him down to point
gets a half stride forward and pushes it down the pitch
we've seen Riaz beating the right-hander quite a few times already, once again wide and he fails to make contact
nips it back inwards and he manages to get behind the line to defends
he tries to run it round the corner but it really balloons off his thigh pad and rolls to long leg
tossed up on middle and leg and he pushes it to the on side
keeps a bit low and he opens the face of the bat and dabs it wide of point
down the leg side and it clips his pads
quicker delivery and he places it to the off side
goes back and punches it down to cover
beats him outside the off stump as he tries to dab that away
drives down the track and Afridi dives to stop that
yet another five-for for Afridi! The sharp googly is too good for Ashraf, jags back in from wide outside off and catches Ashraf flush on the pad in front of the stumps
pushes it towards cover and he squeezes a single
lunges forward to defend and gets an inside edge onto the pads
well swept! He tosses it on middle and leg and gets on his knee and sweeps him hard behind square on the on side
down the leg side
gets on the front foot and pushes it to cover
tossed up on middle and leg and he gets forward to defend
gets forward and beats him and misses the off stump
Not the best day at work for Ajmal, he tosses it up on middle and leg and Zadran gets on his knee and gives it a tonk over deep midwicket
flatter delivery and he defends
reaches out to drive a wide ball outside the off stump and he gets an inside edge past the stumps
another reverse sweep! Shenwari changes guard and falls over at the crease as he plays the shot, doesn't matter though because he finds the gap comfortably at sweeper cover
taps it to the on side
tries to nudge it to the on sie and gets caught on the pad
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
gets forward and blocks it out again
gets a half stride forward and defends
opens the face of the bat to a ball that skids through and he places it to third man
opens the face of the bat and places it to point
stands pretty wide outside the leg stump to give himself room,  he squeezes out a full delivery to cover
exposes his stumps again, he makes room and taps it towards cover
overthrows! He places it towards cover and the throw to the keeper's end was wide, Akmal dives but can't save it
good length delivery outside off and he punches it to point
stabs at it towards mid-off and charges off his crease, another quick single taken
Gul bowls the slower ball and the batsman decides against anything expansive and opts to defend
full and wide outside the off stump and he slashes at it and carves it down to third man, aggressive and effective
does well to squeeze out a fast yorker outside off
makes room to a length delivery and carves it over point, third man is square
jabs it down towards mid-off and once again the calling and running is good
the middle stump goes for a toss! Zadran stands wide outside the leg stump to give himself room, Riaz gets some reverse swing and beats the bat, the stump goes back a few yards
full and wide outside off and Hotak was expecting a wide call but the bowler was lucky to get away with that

Shenwari tries to get very innovative and moves right across his stumps and tries to paddle a full toss wide of short fine leg, the ball clips his pads in front of the stumps, he appears to show his bat to the umpire but Taufel was convinced the ball snuck past the bat
digts out a yorker to the off side
fullish in length outside off and he squirts it out to the off side
on the blockhole on middle and off and he digs it out
outside off and he goes for the drive and misses
fullish outside off and he squeezes it back down the track
Zadran thuds a full delivery down the ground but doesn't time it well
there was a sound as the ball passed the bat but that was the sound of bat on ground, Akmal was the only on appealing

this time Akmal gets his man! Hotak chips down the track and gets an outside edge on the drive, Akmal takes the low catch and basically pleads with the umpire but he didn't have to wait too long for the umpire's decision

inn2.comm: pulled and well stopped at short square leg, Hafeez pulls stylishly on one leg
it's short again and it sits up nicely for Hafeez as he swivels and pulls nicely over the arc between midwicket and square leg
excellent comeback by the bowler! Hafeez was on the back foot and the ball bounced and fizzed past his outside edge
keeps a bit low and he chops it down the track
well bowled! Hafeez is circumspect again outside the off stump, the ball is just wide of the off stump and Hafeez was rooted to the crease, he smiles back at the bowler
stays on the back foot and gets a thick outside edge past point, exciting first over
lands it a shade wide of the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
stays on the backfoot and he defends down the track
drifts on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
nips back in and he appears to get a thin inside edge onto his pads, Zadran and the rest appeal confidently
moves away slightly and he safely leaves it alone
comes back into him and he stays back to defend
that was a beauty of A delivery which was pitched up and seamed away late, beating the outside edge, deserved a wicket there
shorter delivery and he's forced on the back foot to defend
once again Zadran gets extra bounce which keeps Farhat on alert, he manages to stab it to the off side
pitched up outside off and he spoons it in the air but it falls short of the fielders on the off side
full on the pads and nicely punched down to mid-on
the ball keeps low again and it sneaks underneath the bat
inside edge and Hafeez is quite lucky to be there as the ball trickles past the stumps and runs to fine leg, Shapoor does well to boot it away
full delivery and Hafeez punches it back to the bowler who gathers it and nearly flings it back
stays beside the line and steers him down towards point
keeps it outside the off stump and Hafeez leaves it alone, the ball moved away
played on! Thus time Dawlat brings the ball back in and cramps him for room, the ball was a touch quicker too and Hafeez was trapped at the crease trying to fend it off, inside edge onto the stumps
poor ball strays down the leg side and Farhat gets a faint tickle and the ball races past the keeper
on the pads and he clips it just wide of midwicket
stays behind the line and defends to the off side
fullish in length outside the off stump and he mistimes the drive towards mid-off
that;s a lovely drive, off the front foot to a full and wide delivery, had to be put away, expansive drive beats extra cover
another meaty drive off the front foot to a full delivery but he finds mid-off
whips one across Farhat at pace, and the portly reverse-sweeping keeper is up in appeal.. No noise as the ball passes Farhat's flay on the up.
pitched further up wide of off stump, Farhat drives hard into the off side and point fields.
on the pads, worked with the able towards square leg.
back of a length from Dawlat, Shafiq defends from the crease ... Uh oh, he's over-stepped. Free hit coming up.
the free-hit is a slow legcutter that he drops short, and once Shafiq picked it, it was going only one place. Heaved away happily through square leg. Bad time to bowl a no-ball.
over-pitched now, on Asad's toes, and he's quite fired up after that exchange. Whipped with ease through backward square leg for four more. And Shapoor's dive isn't good enough to stop it.
ends the over with another full ball zipping in, and it is driven fluently to mid-on.

aha, third umpire referral for a run out call. Shapoor angles in from over the stumps, and Farhat tucks to the leg side. Easy single on offer, but his bat gets stuck in the turf as he runs in, and falls out of his hand. He has to step into the crease, but still manages to make it in time.
short of a length, Asad stays behind the line and defends.
pitched up wide of off stump, Asad shoulders arms as it angles across him.
short of a length, not much movement for Shapoor. Another leave from Asad.
back of a length, opens the face and steers behind point.

top placement from Shafiq. Slower ball outside off, he waits and waits and cleaves it between point and cover, who both made efforts to cut it off. Cover chased it all the way and dived headlong towards the skirting to pull it off, but his valiant effort was in vain. Shapoor isn't happy with him!
pitches it up outside of, Farhat squeezes it off the outside edge towards point.
short of a length, Farhat stays back in the crease and defends to the off side.
width outside off, Farhat tries to flay it away square but finds point.
leading edge, but Farhat gets away with it. He was leaning too far forward and trying to close the face on it. The ball popped up towards mid-on but landed short.
back of a length, angles into the pads but Farhat can't get it away., He's struggling to time it.
stays beside the line and knocks it to the off side
angles away from the right-hander, he stays at the crease and has to stretch his bat out, misses
fullish in length outside the off stump and he drives to mid-off
Shafiq watchfully leaves it alone to the keeper, he held the length back just a bit
half volley outside the off stump and he drives forcefully but can't beat the packed off side field

overthrows! Very sloppy indeed, Shafiq steers it towards point and steps out of his crease but is sent back, the fielder decided to have a shy at the stumps but his throw was about 2 miles wide of the stumps and any fielder backing up
pitched up and swinging away from the off stump, he drives but gets an outside edge that races to third man, the fielder was too square
drives inside out square on the off side and the backward point fielder does really well to slide to his right
gets across and drops it with soft hands to the on side
plays across the line! Dawlat gets the ball to swing in late, Shafiq gets across his stumps and tries to work it across the line, hits him in front of off stump, Taufel's convinced
gets a bit high on the bat but Younis manages to steer it away
fullish in length on the off stump and he softly pushes it to the off side
goes back and defends towards midwicket
too full and wide outside off and Farhat gets on his knee and plays an expansive drive that beats extra cover, probably should have had that covered
pitched up a bit more and he beats the outside edge and Shahzad was pleading for the edge, he was the only one appealing
slants across the off stump and the umpire delays the call for the wide
fullish outside off and punched towards cover
goes back and taps it towards cover and point
stays back and punches it to the on side
gives him width and he stays back and cuts towards point
the ball keeps a bit low and skids through, beats the outside edge
stays back and clips it to the on side
nicely punched down the ground off the front foot to long-on
full on the stumps and he pushes it down the ground to long-on
gets across his stumps and knocks it to the on side
drops it to the on side again for an easy single
quick single down towards cover
slower ball and he drills it down the track
tucks it towards mid-on
goes back, waits for the turn and cuts to the off side
that was slapped hard, goes back, waits for the turn and bashes that wide of extra cover, despairing dive at the boundary
inside edge onto the pads and Shahzad appeals anyway
drives him down to sweeper cover
stays back and jabs at it towards short cover
gets forward and pushes it through the line down to long-on
effortless drive, Younis was anyway a toch forward and the ball was full, he leant into it and bisected the gap well between mid-off and cover
turns it towards mid-on
punches it towards cover point for a single
gets across and taps it towards the on side
gets across and punches it back to the bowler
gets beside the line and steers it past point, sweeper cover runs across and mops up
Hotak drops it short and Farhat rocks back and thrashes it past extra cover, all power
was that the left-armer's doosra? He spun like the conventional left-arm orthodox but it spun the other way and beat the left-hander, must have hit a crack or pebble or something
tucks it down to midwicket
dabs it down to third man
tucks it towards square leg
full on middle and leg, he pushes it down to mid-on
fullish outside the off stump and he punches it down to point
punches a good length delivery down to cover
fullish outside off and drives to sweeper cover
full on middle and leg and he punches it down to mid-on
skidded through and kept low, Younis gets an inside edge past his pads
gets forward and drives to the off side
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives towards cover
keeps a touch low again and he manages to keep it out
drives it with soft hands down to cover
chance for a run-out! Younis pushes it on the walk down to mid-on and challenges Nabi, a direct hit would have sent Younis packing
stays beside the line and steers it to the off side
Dropped: Farhat mows a full delivery across the line and tries to clear mid-on, Mangal leaps and gets a hand to it but the ball races to the boundary
he oversteps, takes a single to the off side
Free Hit: Well bowled! On the blockhole and Younis can only squeeze it to the off side
gets forward and drives to sweeper cover
drifts on the pads and he shuffles and clips him down towards square leg
sweeps hard and just beats the diving fielder at square leg, Farhat did well to get down early and get a lot of power behind that shot
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
sweeps again but he goes finer this time, drifting down the leg side, he places the sweep between square leg and short fine leg
comes forward and he pushes a full delivery down to cover
stays back and the ball keeps low and he chops it down to point
fifty for Farhat! Hotak tosses it up on middle and leg and he nicely tucks it away wide of mid-on
tossed up on middle and leg, he clips it to the on side
fullish on middle and off, he works it to mid-on
gets forward and softly tucks it to the on side
tapped to the off side and Younis wants the run but Farhat wisely sends him back

Communication breakdown again! Younis tucks it down to square leg and he sets off, Farhat too ambles out of his crease and then sends Younis back after the fielder slides and cuts it off, indecision everywhere
stays back and works it with the turn to the off side
keeps low, turns and skids, he tries to cut but misses
this one spun back in sharply, Farhat just manages  to keep it out in front of his stumps
soft dismissal! Shenwari dropped the leg break a bit short, Farhat rocked back, showed the full face of the bat and spooned it back to the bowler, easy catch

gets a long hop straightaway, Misbah rocks back at the crease and clubs it from outside off and beats midwicket, two fielders converge at the deep but the ball just evades the fielder running in from long-on
keeps low, tries to cut but is beaten
he drops it short and wide and Younis rocks back and thumps it wide of extra cover
shot of intent there! Younis fetched that from slightly wide outside the off stump and it was in the air and well clear of any fielder, powerful sweep
tossed up wide outside off and the ball spins back in and beats the drive
sweeps again but can't beat square leg
stays back and defends with soft hands down the track
drops it short, he rocks back and punches it towards long-on
gets well forward and defends
tossed up outside off and he pushes it to sweeper cover
drifts down the leg side and it deflects off the keeper
gets forward and defends
gets forward and drives down to long-on
lands outside off and he shoulders arms
gets forward and pushes it down to long-on
gets a thick inside edge onto the pads
steers it past point
he clips it down to midwicket
plonks forward and defends it to the on side
goes back at the crease and punches it in the air down to mid-on
gets well forward and defends
gets forward and drives to the off side
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives through the line to long-off
goes back at the crease, the ball skids through and he gets an edge onto the boot
plonks forward and defends to the on side
shuffles right across his stumps and tucks it round the corner
top edges the sweep  but he clears short fine leg, the fielder in the deep runs across and cuts it off
punches it down to long-on
on the blockhole and he fails to jam it out
drops it fractionally short, he rocks back and pulls and nearly clears the rope at deep midwicket
shortish and he pushes it to sweeper cover
jams a full delivery back to the bowler
chops it down towards short cover
tossed up on the off stump, Misbah gets on  his knee and muscles that over deep midwicket, all power behind that
jams it out to the on side
Younis opens the face of the bat and deftly steers it wide of the keeper, Nabi does really well to sprint to his left and cut it off
works it down to the vacant square leg region
there appeared to be a sound as it passed the batsman down the leg side, but it's called a wide, Shahzad is quite flummoxed
fullish on middle and leg and pushed down to mid-on
good length on the stumps and he leans forward and defends
tries to steer it past the ring on the off side but he can't beat point
brings the ball back in and he defends solidly
he makes the mistake by bowling it flat and full, Younis gets on his knee and muscles the sweep past short fine leg and long leg, the fielder at the deep gives up the chase
drops it a bit short outside off, Younis rocks back and cuts wide of point, the sweeper cuts it off
tries to sweep but he's hit outside the line of the off stump, the ball hits the base of his pad and Nabi appeals, they take a leg bye as the ball deflects and lands on the off side
pushes it to the on side
stays back and steers it past point, sweeper cover picks up
jams out a ful delivery down to point
gets beside the line and steers it down to point
good length outside off and he steers it down to cover
gets this one to nip back in close to the off stump, Misbah defends
nips back in again and Misbah stays back at the crease to defend
stays back to defend and it's a maiden over
lands it outside leg and gets it to move away, the ball keeps low and sneaks past the outside edge
brings up the fifty stand with a single down to midwicket off the back foot
gets a bit of extra bounce outside the off stump and he stands tall and places it to deep point
angles across the right-hander and he steers it down to third man
good length outside off and he places it wide of point
full delivery angling away and he can't resist a drive, he gets an outside edge and the keeper dives to his right and gets a glove to it but it's a tough one
pushes it down towards cover
nips it back in and he steers it to the off side
gets it to kick up a bit from outside the off stump and Misbah taps it towards point
stays back and clips it with the angle down to mid-on
lovely straight drive! The ball angles in to him and Younis turns the face of the bat slightly and strikes it off the meat of the bat, beats mid-on comfortably, brings up his fifty as well
and another! It's a low full toss on middle and leg and he uses his wrists well to clip it wide of midwicket
fires it on a good length and angles it across the right-hander, beats the outside edge
opens the face of the bat and steers it straight to point
full outside off and he gets across and gets an inside edge down to the on side
gets beside the line, opens the face of the bat and places it to point, well stopped by the fielder
this game's finishing fast, full and wide outside the off stump, he reaches forward and gives it a thrash off the front foot past cover
flatter delivery and he punches it down to sweeper cover
full outside the off stump and he punches it down to long-off
keeps a touch low again, he pushes it down to cover point
gets across and pushes a full delivery to sweeper cover
pushes a full delivery back to the bowler
drives off the front foot but can't beat mid-off
fullish delivery on the off stump and he thuds it down the track, Shapoor's boot gets in the way
Misbah sizes to blast that out of the ground but then changes his mind and defends as it was a slower delivery

straight six! Misbah stands at the crease and lofts through the line, Nabi does really well to even attempt a one-handed catch at the edge of the rope and he nearly cleans up an attendant near the sightscreen
powers it down the ground but mid-off's deep enough to run across and stop it
squeezes it in front of point
Shapoor was lucky to get his head out of the way! Misbah smacked a low full toss straight back towards the bowler, Shapoor just about evaded it and the ball went scorching to long-on
the field is up and Younis wants to get this done with, pitched up and swinging in and he stays at the crease and scoops it over mid-on
bowls it shorter and he opens the face and steers it to third man
he makes room to slam it past the off side but it's a slower ball and he just pats it away
slower ball down the leg side and wide called
slower ball again and he opts not to bash it away, pushes it to the off side
steers it straight to cover point
short and he swivels and pulls hard but finds deep square leg
in a day of reverse sweeps Misbah decides to finish things off with one, changes guard and plays a lap sweep past short third man
